charges.charge_description: 18:641.F PUBLIC MONEY, PROPERTY OR RECORDS-postal money orders-10/08/96-07/28/97 CTS 1-7 (1)

charges.charge_disposition: ADJUDGED: 5 years probation upon the following special conditions: 1. That the deft not commit any federal, state or local; 2. That the deft not possess illegal controlled substances; 3. That the deft shall refrain from any unlawful use of a controlled substance. The deft shall submit to one drug test within 15 days of sentencing and at least two drug tests thereafter, as directed by the Probation Office (mandatory condition); 4. That the deft is prohibited from possessing a firearm as defined in 18 U.S.C. 921; 5. That the deft pay restitution of $2,185.00 to Brigham Young University-Hawaii Campus immediately and any remaining balacne on an installment basis at a rate of not less than 10 percent of her monthly gross income as directed by the Probation Office; 6. That the deft provide the Probation Office access to any requested financial information; SA: $100.00; (1)
